EmailTemplate.name: 201805_Global_Email_Prospect_OperationJetSet_mih.201805_Global_Email#1_Operation
EmailTemplate.subject: Become an Insider: Be the First to Know about Honeywell’s Upcoming Launch!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/operationjetset#anchor]]> Honeywell is working on something that you will want to know about! We are launching a new technology for GoDirect™ Flight Services that will improve the way you fly.
Sign up to be the first to know in July for an early reveal to something smarter, faster and more accurate that will help enable safer, more efficient flights! Don't wait to learn what it is.
By signing up to become an insider, you are also entering for a chance to win one of these epic prizes:
- Flying experience using the new technology with Honeywell’s flight test team on a test plane!
- 1-Year GoDirect Flight Planning subscription for FREE
- Honeywell swag bag of gifts
*Please see official sweepstakes details and rules HERE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/~/media/aerospace/files/contest-rules/contestrules.pdf]]>
SIGN UP FOR THE EARLY REVEAL <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/operationjetset#anchor]]>
Don’t miss out! Get the latest updates online and follow Honeywell Aerospace on social media with the hashtag #OperationJetSet.
Honeywell GoDirect Team
